rect.style: fill: none; stroke: #f8f8f8; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #2ca9bc; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #2ca9bc; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
fill: none; stroke: #2ca9bc; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
